title: Client Crash
body: Anyone else having client crash well in champion select and why are we punished for client crash really annoying to have timers or have a loss on my promos because client crashed

replies.body:
Because a disconnection negatively impacts everyone in the match, regardless of intent, they're treated equally by the system. This is a big reason why penalties cannot be modified after they've been recorded by the server. This includes LP loss, match losses, or low priority queues.

Crashes in champ select are most often a result of the client dropping its connection to the game platform entirely. Incompatible network settings or problems along your route to the server are the most common causes to this. As a first step in resolving this, I encourage you to take a look at the [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) we've created to address these types of situations.

Let me know if those steps caused any change to your crashing.
